00020 #ifndef TLM_FIFO_HEADER
00021 #define TLM_FIFO_HEADER
00022 
00023 //
00024 // This implements put, get and peek
00025 //
00026 // It also implements 0 and infinite size fifos - but the size
00027 // zero fifos aren't rendezvous like zero length fifos, they simply are both
00028 // full and empty at the same time.
00029 //
00030 // The size can be dynamically changed using the resize interface
00031 //
00032 // To get an infinite fifo use a -ve size in the constructor.
00033 // The absolute value of the size is taken as the starting size of the
00034 // actual physical buffer.
00035 //
00036 
00037 //#include <systemc.h>
00038 
00039 #include "tlm_h/tlm_core/tlm_interfaces/tlm_fifo_ifs.h"
00040 #include "tlm_h/tlm_core/tlm_fifo/circular_buffer.h"
00041 
00042 
00043 
00044 template <class T>
00045 class tlm_fifo :
00046   public virtual tlm_fifo_get_if<T>,
00047   public virtual tlm_fifo_put_if<T>,
00048   public sc_prim_channel
00049 {
00050 public:
00051 
00052     // constructors
00053 
00054     explicit tlm_fifo( int size_ = 1 )
00055       : sc_prim_channel( sc_gen_unique_name( "fifo" ) ) {
00056      
00057       init( size_ );
00058 
00059     }
00060 
00061     explicit tlm_fifo( const char* name_, int size_ = 1 )
00062       : sc_prim_channel( name_ ) {
00063     
00064       init( size_ );
00065 
00066     }
00067 
00068     // destructor
00069 
00070     virtual ~tlm_fifo() {
00071 
00072       if( buffer != 0 ) delete buffer;
00073 
00074     }
00075 
00076     // tlm get interface
00077 
00078     T get( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 );
00079 
00080     bool nb_get( T& );
00081     bool nb_can_get( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const;
00082     const sc_event &ok_to_get( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const {
00083       return m_data_written_event;
00084     }
00085 
00086     // tlm peek interface
00087 
00088     T peek( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const;
00089 
00090     bool nb_peek( T& ) const;
00091     bool nb_can_peek( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const;
00092     const sc_event &ok_to_peek( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const {
00093       return m_data_written_event;
00094     }
00095 
00096     // tlm put interface 
00097 
00098     void put( const T& );
00099 
00100     bool nb_put( const T& );
00101     bool nb_can_put( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const;
00102 
00103     const sc_event& ok_to_put( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const {
00104       return m_data_read_event;
00105     }
00106 
00107     // resize if
00108 
00109     void nb_expand( unsigned int n = 1 );
00110     void nb_unbound( unsigned int n = 16 );
00111 
00112     bool nb_reduce( unsigned int n = 1 );
00113     bool nb_bound( unsigned int n );
00114 
00115     // debug interface
00116 
00117     bool nb_peek( T & , int n ) const;
00118     bool nb_poke( const T & , int n = 0 );
00119 
00120     int used() const {
00121       return m_num_readable - m_num_read;
00122     }
00123 
00124     int size() const {
00125       return m_size;
00126     }
00127 
00128     void debug() const {
00129 
00130       if( is_empty() ) cout << "empty" << endl;
00131       if( is_full() ) cout << "full" << endl;
00132 
00133       cout << "size " << size() << " - " << used() << " used " << endl;
00134       cout << "readable " << m_num_readable << endl;
00135       cout << "written/read " << m_num_written << "/" << m_num_read << endl;
00136 
00137     }
00138 
00139     // support functions
00140 
00141     static const char* const kind_string;
00142 
00143     const char* kind() const
00144         { return kind_string; }
00145 
00146 
00147     friend class tlm_annotated::tlm_annotated_fifo<T>;
00148 
00149 private: // some methods to support tlm_annotated_fifo !
00150 
00151     bool nb_can_put( int count , tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const {
00152       if( m_size < 0 ) {
00153         return true;
00154       }
00155       return m_num_readable + m_num_written + count <= m_size;
00156     }
00157 
00158     bool nb_get_no_notify( T& );
00159 
00160 protected:
00161     sc_event &read_event( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) {
00162       return m_data_read_event;
00163     }
00164 
00165 protected:
00166 
00167     void update();
00168 
00169     // support methods
00170 
00171     void init( int );
00172 
00173 protected:
00174 
00175     circular_buffer<T> *buffer;
00176 
00177     int m_size;                  // logical size of fifo
00178 
00179     int m_num_readable;          // #samples readable
00180     int m_num_read;              // #samples read during this delta cycle
00181     int m_num_written;           // #samples written during this delta cycle
00182     bool m_expand;               // has an expand occurred during this delta cycle ? 
00183     int m_num_read_no_notify;    // #samples read without notify during this delta cycle
00184 
00185     sc_event m_data_read_event;
00186     sc_event m_data_written_event;
00187 
00188 private:
00189 
00190     // disabled
00191     tlm_fifo( const tlm_fifo<T>& );
00192     tlm_fifo& operator = ( const tlm_fifo<T>& );
00193 
00194     //
00195     // use nb_can_get() and nb_can_put() rather than the following two
00196     // private functions
00197     //
00198 
00199     bool is_empty() const { 
00200       return used() == 0;
00201     }
00202 
00203     bool is_full() const {
00204       return size() == m_num_readable + m_num_written;
00205     }
00206 
00207 };
00208 
00209 template <typename T>
00210 const char* const tlm_fifo<T>::kind_string = "tlm_fifo";
00211 
00212 
00213 /******************************************************************
00214 //
00215 // init and update
00216 //
00217 ******************************************************************/
00218 
00219 template< typename T >
00220 inline 
00221 void
00222 tlm_fifo<T>::init( int size_ ) {
00223 
00224   if( size_ > 0 ) {
00225     buffer = new circular_buffer<T>( size_);
00226   }
00227   
00228   else if( size_ < 0 ) {
00229     buffer = new circular_buffer<T>( -size_ );
00230   }
00231 
00232   else {
00233     buffer = new circular_buffer<T>( 16 );
00234   }
00235 
00236   m_size = size_;
00237   m_num_readable = 0;
00238   m_num_read = 0;
00239   m_num_written = 0;
00240   m_expand = false;
00241   m_num_read_no_notify = false;
00242 
00243 }
00244 
00245 template < typename T>
00246 inline
00247 void
00248 tlm_fifo<T>::update()
00249 {
00250     if( m_num_read > m_num_read_no_notify || m_expand ) {
00251         m_data_read_event.notify( SC_ZERO_TIME );
00252     }
00253 
00254     if( m_num_written > 0 ) {
00255         m_data_written_event.notify( SC_ZERO_TIME );
00256     }
00257 
00258     m_expand = false;
00259     m_num_read = 0;
00260     m_num_written = 0;
00261     m_num_readable = buffer->used();
00262     m_num_read_no_notify = 0;
00263 
00264 }

00268 #include "tlm_h/tlm_core/tlm_fifo/tlm_fifo_resize.h"
00269 
00270 #endif
